ClassDesc: Provides base-level UI operations (such as injection of https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#MotionEvent_E@s) that can be used to build user actions such as clicks, scrolls, swipes, etc. This replaces parts of the android Instrumentation class that provides similar functionality. However, it provides a more advanced synchronization mechanism for test actions. The key differentiators are: test actions are assumed to be called on the main thread after a test action is initiated, execution blocks until all messages in the main message queue have been cleared.
